title: What is a White Hat Jr. franchise? - Quora

response.answer_text: White hat Jr is the platform for the learning of technology for kids 8–14 age. Powered by Google and IBM which are supporting it. This concept is created as the kids brainstorming so to get new and high-quality developers as the behavior nature's in human learning and development. As this human behavior is used from history path, in history they made spy, soldiers, etc. So the concept is new in india but they are having some recruitment done in Delhi and Bangalore region, as the government of India should have to introduce technology in India school learning but the level of making only to use computer using and learning basic about computer systems only. The students platform should also be increased on the language section then these heavy-duty courses from white hat Jr will get succeed then.
